name: ULTIMATE Tic Tac Toe (FutureYT)
description:
ULTIMATE Tic Tac Toe
For two players

How to play:

The players choose a symbol to play as: X or O.
In their turn, every player puts their symbol in a slot. There are nine tables, and in each table there are nine slots.
The position of the slot a player puts their symbol in, will determine in which one of the tables the other player will need to put their symbol in the next turn.
For example: the X player puts an X in the top left slot of a table, so the O player will need to put an O in the top left table.
When one table has a line of three of the same symbol in it, the whole table turns into that symbol.
The winner is the player who's got a line of three tables that turned into their symbol.
